text: Napoleon and Samantha is a 1972 American adventure drama movie directed by Bernard McEveety and starring Michael Douglas, Jodie Foster, Johnny Whitaker, Will Geer, Arch Johnson, Rex Holman, Ellen Corby and John Lupton. It was distributed by Walt Disney Pictures. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1973.
